verses.name: Luke 7:16
verses.text: And there came a fear on all: and they glorified God, saying, That a great prophet is risen up among us; and, That God hath visited his people.

verses.name: Luke 7:17
verses.text: And this rumour of him went forth throughout all Judea, and throughout all the region round about.

verses.name: Luke 7:18
verses.text: And the disciples of John shewed him of all these things.

verses.name: Luke 7:19
verses.text: And John calling unto him two of his disciples sent them to Jesus, saying, Art thou he that should come? or look we for another?
